description: These beautiful shortbread cookies are lightly scented with rosewater then dipped in white chocolate and scattered with rose petals and pistachios.
name: Rose & Pistachio Shortbread Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the white chocolate in a bowl in 30 second bursts in the microwave, stirring each time. Dip half of each cookie in the chocolate, place on a wire rack and sprinkle each one with chopped pistachios and rose petals on the chocolate dipped side.
